content: There is no mystery, per the Citibank site: “We are currently upgrading portions of our website, and it may be unavailable from 12:00 a.m. Eastern Time to 7:00 a.m. Eastern Time on Sunday, May 3rd. We apologize if you experience any inconvenience and thank you for your patience.” Apparently all the kinks have not been worked out. “https://www.citicards.com/cards/wv/home.do”
